content.en: Adaptive Control Algorithms: Researchers are investigating the effectiveness of adaptive control algorithms in various scenarios. These algorithms have the agency to control the dynamics of a system after a perturbation, identify linear dynamic systems in the presence of uncertainty, synthesize adaptive controllers for optimal robust tracking, track time-varying dynamics of a system, design stable algorithms for filtering and identification, develop adaptive algorithms for slowly varying data, achieve approximate asymptotic tracking for infinite-dimensional systems, analyze and design robust adaptive control, filtering, and prediction, advance adaptive control algorithms for nonlinear systems, analyze the robustness of adaptive systems to unmodelled dynamics and disturbances, achieve adaptive control for plants with unknown order and high frequency gain, integrate robust control, identification, and adaptive control, develop adaptation algorithms for systems with a general nonlinear parameterization, achieve adaptive feedback based on system performance under uncertainty, guarantee the robust global stability of continuous-time model reference adaptive control systems, analyze the robustness of adaptive controllers to non-linear time-varying unmodelled dynamics, design globally stable adaptive controllers for linear discrete systems, analyze the non-linear features of adaptive control algorithms and achieve robust stabilization, design simple adaptive algorithms for systems with low-order models, and analyze the robustness of adaptive systems using a variable σ-factor. Additionally, researchers are exploring a unified approach to the steady-state and tracking analyses of adaptive filters.
content.da: Adaptive kontrolalgoritmer: Forskere undersøger effektiviteten af adaptive kontrolalgoritmer i forskellige scenarier. Disse algoritmer har evnen til at styre dynamikken i et system efter en forstyrrelse, identificere lineære dynamiske systemer i nærvær af usikkerhed, syntetisere adaptive controllere til optimal robust sporing, spore tidsvarierende dynamik i et system, designe stabile algoritmer til filtrering og identifikation, udvikle adaptive algoritmer til langsomt varierende data, opnå tilnærmet asymptotisk sporing for uendimensionale systemer, analysere og designe robust adaptiv kontrol, filtrering og forudsigelse, fremme adaptive kontrolalgoritmer for ikke-lineære systemer, analysere robustheden af adaptive systemer til umodellerede dynamikker og forstyrrelser, opnå adaptiv kontrol for planter med ukendt orden og højfrekvensgevinst, integrere robust kontrol, identifikation og adaptiv kontrol, udvikle adaptionsalgoritmer for systemer med en generel ikke-lineær parameterisering, opnå adaptiv feedback baseret på systempræstation under usikkerhed, garantere den robuste globale stabilitet af kontinuertids-modelreference-adaptive kontrolsystemer, analysere robustheden af adaptive controllere til ikke-lineær tidsvarierende umodelleret dynamik, designe globalt stabile adaptive controllere til lineære diskrete systemer, analysere de ikke-lineære træk ved adaptive kontrolalgoritmer og opnå robust stabilisering, designe simple adaptive algoritmer for systemer med lav-ordens modeller, og analysere robustheden af adaptive systemer ved brug af en variabel σ-faktor. Derudover udforsker forskere en samlet tilgang til steady-state og sporeanalyser af adaptive filtre.
